properties.class: Palus Knight, Assassin, Dark Wizard, Shillien Oracle

steps.text: Talk to Magister Kaira in the Dark Elf Guild of the Town of Giran.
Talk to Brother Metheus in the Town of Giran.
Go to the Execution Grounds, hunt Hangman Tree, until you have Kassandra's Remains .
Talk to Brother Metheus in the Town of Giran.
Talk to Brother Metheus once again.
Talk to Master Ixia in Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.

You need to collect the ingredients for the poison: Go to the Gorgon Flower Garden, hunt Medusa, until you have Medusa's Blood  — 10 pcs.. Go to the Execution Grounds, hunt Corpse Tracker, until you have Corpse Tracker Dung . Go to the Wasteland, hunt Tyrant (monster) and Elder Tyrant, until you have Tyrant's Blood  — 10 pcs.. Go to Cruma Marshlands, hunt Marsh Stakato, Marsh Stakato Worker, Marsh Stakato Soldier, Marsh Stakato Drone, collect Nightshade Root  — 10 pcs., hunt Marsh Spider, collect Marsh Spider Fluids  — 10 pcs.
Talk to Master Ixia in Dark Elf Guild in the Town of Dion.
Talk to Brother Metheus in the Town of Giran.
Talk to Magister Kaira in the Dark Elf Guild of the Town of Giran.
Alders' Spirit will appear. Talk to him.
Talk to Magister Roa in the Mage Guild in the Town of Giran. Note: choose the second answer in the list: say the Moon shines anyway.
Talk to Warehouse Keeper Norman in the Warehouse in Gludin Village.
Talk to Magister Kaira in the Dark Elf Guild of the Town of Giran.
Talk to Great Hierarch Thifiell in Shilen Sanctum in the Dark Elf Village.
Talk to Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites.

Collect the items: Talk to Blight Treant near Dark Elf Village. Talk to Bloody Pixy near Dark Elf Village. Go to the Swampland, hunt quest monsters Black Willow Lurker, until you have Black Willow Leaf . Go to the Breka's Stronghold, hunt Breka Orc Prefect, until you have Breka Overlord Skull . Go to the Plains of the Lizardmen, hunt Leto Lizardman Overlord, until you have Leto Overlord Skull . Go to the Hunters Valley, hunt Karul Bugbear, until you have Karul Bugbear Skull . Go to the Death Pass, hunt Grandis, until you have Grandis' Skull . Talk to Bloody Pixy near Dark Elf Village. Talk to Blight Treant near Dark Elf Village. Talk to Witch Arkenia at the Altar of Rites.
Talk to Great Hierarch Thifiell in Shilen Sanctum in the Dark Elf Village and get the reward.
